head.title: Add Barcodes to {{FileFormatUp}} Files Using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Easily generate and embed barcodes in your documents and emails with the {{ProdFullName}} API.

header.title: Create Barcodes for {{FileFormatUp}} Files Using {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can dynamically generate, customize, and embed barcodes into {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Introduction to {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to create professional documents by combining data from multiple sources. Add charts, tables, lists, images, and barcodes to your files with ease. Use templates to organize content exactly where it belongs. Works with more than 50 formats, including PDFs, Office documents, and emails.

more_features.title: Generate Documents with Data-Driven Templates
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can create professional files in popular formats by seamlessly embedding charts, tables, lists, links, images, and barcodes.

feature_1.title: Build Reports with Business Data
feature_1.content: Use the API to populate templates with data from formats like JSON, XML, and CSV quickly and accurately.

feature_2.title: Add Visual Elements
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} supports inserting elements such as charts, tables, lists, text, links, images, and barcodes in real time.

feature_3.title: Control Data Placement
feature_3.content: With LINQ-based templates, you can precisely position data, loop through arrays, and apply custom formatting programmatically.

feature_4.title: Compatible with Many Formats
feature_4.content: Work with files like MS Office documents, PDFs, HTML, OpenOffice files, and emails. Merge multiple documents when needed.

formats.title: Supported File Formats for Report Creation
formats.description: {{EnvName}} handles over 50 file types, making it simple to merge data and process templates for high-quality results.

operations.title: Explore Key Features
operations.description: Simplify document processing with advanced tools and automation capabilities.

examples.comment_1: Use this tag in the template to include a barcode in the output document
examples.comment_2: Specify the path to the template file
examples.comment_3: Load the required data from your source
examples.comment_4: Save the document with the barcode applied

steps.title: Steps to Add a Barcode in {{FileFormatUp}} Files

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to embed barcodes in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. It supports over 60 barcode types, including 1D and 2D formats.
content.step_1: Create a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for barcodes.
content.step_2: Retrieve data from a compatible source.
content.step_3: Set barcode options such as size and resolution.
content.step_4: Save the final document with the barcode embedded.

code_1.title: Example: Generate a Barcode Programmatically
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to programmatically generate and insert a barcode into a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Design a template with a barcode placeholder
code_1.comment_4: Create a data source object with the required details
code_1.comment_7: Save the document with the barcode included

texts_pdf.step_1: Design a template with barcode placeholders (PDF templates are not supported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Export the document with the barcode as a PDF file.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: Note: PDF templates are currently unsupported.
